attributes.review: I downloaded this app and opened it and my phone IMMEDIATELY started freezing and messing up. The app comes with a bunch of viruses that will delete all of your pictures! When I finally got rid of the viruses I tried to delete the app and it wouldn’t delete. The app will not leave me alone and I keep getting scary notifications from it.
attributes.title: Worst APP IMAGINABLE

attributes.review: As a citizen of this country, i find it absolutely ridiculous that this orange, rude, sad excuse of a man is on my phone YET AGAIN. once i downloaded it to feel it out, i got non stop messages and notifications. it also started to make my phone glitch out and i gladly deleted it. if i could give 0 stars, i would.
attributes.title: I am utterly disappointed

attributes.review: I opened the app and realized it was spreading false information, and is quite frankly borderline c*ltish. It’s giving off strong don’t drink the koolaid vibes which I dislike very much.  The app is also outdated I would say around the 1950s-60s era where it was socially acceptable to be r*cist. It really hurts my heart to see white s*premacists run rampant on this app 10/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: Fake news

attributes.review: This app is horrific!! 0/10 do not recommend. It had constant ads the more I used it and eventually it crashed and shut down my entire phone! It deleted everything I had, all of my memories and photos. I am currently writing this on my iPad just to warn people of how terrible it is!!
attributes.title: Deleted my entire phone history!!

attributes.review:
this app is not good at all it delivered a package to my door and the package smelled like spray tan😳😳yeah not good at all ruined cheetos for me not good no buenonobueno. very not good. i seen a orange thing when i opened the app and it made my dog scared and it scared me and its not good very bad very bad. it also is very offensive to me and hurted my feels😫😖😖😖😤😤😣😣😣. very sad very sad now.🥴🥴👁👄👁👀👀👀 👁 👁

attributes.title: Yesyes veryvery bad😳😳🤢

attributes.review: today i download this app to support our president. unfortunately when i opened this app i saw a picture of a racist, homophobic and orange hot cheeto  b*tch. after closing this app HORRIFIED i went about my day😺. i checked my phone and i had a ABSURD amount of spam emails and my phone had a really ugly background of a hot cheeto man🙅🏽‍♀️. i immediately deleted this app👍🏼👍🏼. anyway!! trump 2020🦄👄🤭 in a tombstone❤️😺👍🏼😻!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT GET!

attributes.review: It’s the worse app of all time. I’ve been an IOS user since the first generation of iPads and let me tell you. I have personally never seen an app this disgusting and bad. The design of this app is atrocious and it shouldn’t be part of the App Store. This app is the reason some people haven’t bought an iPhone and frankly they made the right decision!!!!!
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: SOO when I first open the app you see Trump actually trying to make America great again thing and we all know that’s not true so why is it there? Not to mention the lil Cheeto trying to work out like a puked in my mouth five times . And you have to sign up for no reason . WORST APP EVER not to even go off on how racist the lil guy is I bet money he involves that in his lil app .
attributes.title: I’m gonna puke

attributes.review: Once i opened this app my battery started to die super fast and i was so scared it wouldnt even let me delete the app or close it but i finally did some how. Just being on there for one second and seeing an orange with white outlines next to its eyes made me vomit and i demand this app go under review because i lost feeling in my left thumb!!!! Help 🥺
attributes.title: Destroying my life

attributes.review: When I opened the app, not only did it show me a downright terrifying image, but it also showed me the Antichrist and his henchmen! The app is so incompetent that it could get past opening, and when it did the simple task of even opening I was surprised it was able to even do that. Worst app, do NOT recommend!!!
attributes.title: The mountain of problems with this app is HUGE
